p: The chemical composition of H. gymnocephalum essential oil has been reported elsewhere. Mollenbeck et al. [ 26] have shown that 1,8-cineole (66.7%) was the major compound of the essential oil, a level which was higher than in our work (47.7%). Also, in our work, the major compounds were β-caryophyllene (3.3%), γ-terpinene (3.1%), β-pinene (2.7%), α-pinene (2.5%) and ρ-cymene (2.3%).
